trans-unit.source: Provides a static helper class for WPF/Win32 interoperation with one method, which is used to obtain a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Cursor" /> object based on a provided Win32 cursor handle.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe auxiliar estática para interoperação do WPF/Win32 com um método, que é usado para obter um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Cursor" /> do WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation) com base em um identificador de cursor do Win32 fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Cursor reference to use for interoperation.
trans-unit.target: Referência de cursor a ser usada para a interoperação.

trans-unit.source: Returns a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Cursor" /> object based on a provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um objeto [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Cursor" /> baseado em um identificador de cursor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] cursor object based on the provided [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] cursor handle.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de cursor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] baseado no identificador de cursor [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Setting a custom cursor image requires security permissions even if done in pure [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming.
trans-unit.target: Definindo uma imagem personalizada do cursor requer permissões de segurança, mesmo se feito puro [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] de programação.
